original_text: And the skins of the young goats she put on his hands and on the smooth part of his neck.
korean_text: 또 염소 새끼의 가죽을 그의 손과 목의 매끈매끈한 곳에 입히고

sentences.original_text: And she put the skins of the young goats on his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 어린 염소의 가죽을 그의 손에 씌웠고

sentences.original_text: and on the smooth part of his neck.
